name: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
summary: Developed a dynamic dashboard for visualizing complex datasets, enabling users to explore trends and patterns through interactive charts and graphs.
details: Led the front-end development using Vue.js, creating reusable components for charts and UI elements.
Integrated D3.js for sophisticated and custom data visualizations.
Built a Node.js backend with Express.js to serve data from a MongoDB database.
Implemented real-time data updates using WebSockets.
Achieved a 30% improvement in data analysis efficiency for the client.

name: E-commerce Platform Enhancement
summary: Revamped the user interface and improved the performance of an existing e-commerce platform, resulting in increased user engagement and sales.
details: Migrated legacy UI components to React and Redux for better state management and performance.
Designed and implemented a GraphQL API to optimize data fetching.
Improved page load times by 40% through code optimization and lazy loading techniques.
Collaborated with UX designers to create a more intuitive and user-friendly shopping experience.

name: Mobile-First Social Networking App
summary: Designed and developed a cross-platform social networking application with a focus on mobile-first usability and real-time interactions.
details: Utilized Flutter and Dart to build a high-performance, natively compiled application for both iOS and Android.
Leveraged Firebase for backend services including authentication, real-time database, and cloud functions.
Implemented features such as user profiles, content sharing, and instant messaging.
